name: Snake Horror
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The snake horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
text: The snake horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include fireball, heat metal, and lightning bolt.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The snake horror makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, and the target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
